item.description:
TGIF! ..... FUN  FUN  FUN!!

Let's kick off the weekend with a Martini Happy Hour and Psychic Party!   Alisa has graciously offered to let us use her home for this fun and interesting evening!  

Please bring your favorite martini recipe ingredients and a snack to share!  

Vanessa will be offering 1/2 hour readings on topics that include career/money, relationships, health etc.  Readings are $55 for 1/2 hour and are recorded.   Only 8 reading spots available!  Contact Vanessa via email or 203-783-1811 to secure an appointment.

So, come and enjoy a martini (or other beverage of choice), great company and psychic guidance all in one evening!

From 5 pm BYOB and snack. $ 15 non-refundable deposit for readings.

FUN  FUN  FUN

 

For more information about Vanessa click  Heavensguide

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: TGIF Martini Happy Hour!!
